00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <cstddef>
00010 #include <iterator>
00011 
00012 namespace lsf {
00013 namespace container {
00014 namespace detail {
00015 
00017 // ListNode
00019 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00020 struct ListNode {
00021     SizeType prev_pos;
00022     SizeType next_pos;
00023     ElemType data;
00024     bool is_use;
00025 };
00026 
00028 // ListState
00030 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00031 class ListState {
00032 public:
00033     using value_type = ElemType;
00034     using size_type = SizeType;
00035     using node_type = ListNode<ElemType, SizeType>;
00036     using this_type = ListState<ElemType, SizeType>;
00037 
00038     static const size_type ENDPOS = 0;
00039 
00040 public:
00041     void Init(size_t byte_size) {
00042         _size = 0;
00043         _max_size = (byte_size - sizeof(this_type)) / sizeof(node_type);
00044         _elem_byte_size = sizeof(value_type);
00045         _empty_head_pos = 1;
00046         _head_pos = 0;
00047 
00048         // make list a loop
00049         GetIsUse(ENDPOS) = false;
00050         GetNextPos(ENDPOS) = ENDPOS;
00051         GetPrevPos(ENDPOS) = ENDPOS;
00052 
00053         // make empty list a loop
00054         for (size_type pos = 1; pos < _max_size; pos++) {
00055             GetIsUse(pos) = false;
00056             GetNextPos(pos) = pos + 1;
00057             GetPrevPos(pos) = pos - 1;
00058         }
00059         GetPrevPos(1) = _max_size - 1;
00060         GetNextPos(_max_size - 1) = 1;
00061     }
00062 
00063     // get a node from empty list, and insert into list
00064     size_type GetNewNodeAndInsert(size_type insert_pos) {
00065         // get node from empty list
00066         size_type pos = _empty_head_pos;
00067         if (GetNextPos(_empty_head_pos) == _empty_head_pos) {  // single node loop
00068             _empty_head_pos = ENDPOS;
00069         } else {
00070             GetPrevPos(GetNextPos(_empty_head_pos)) = GetPrevPos(_empty_head_pos);
00071             GetNextPos(GetPrevPos(_empty_head_pos)) = GetNextPos(_empty_head_pos);
00072             _empty_head_pos = GetNextPos(_empty_head_pos);
00073         }
00074 
00075         // insert pos before the insert_pos in list
00076         _size++;
00077         GetIsUse(pos) = true;
00078         GetNextPos(pos) = insert_pos;
00079         GetPrevPos(pos) = GetPrevPos(insert_pos);
00080         GetPrevPos(GetNextPos(pos)) = pos;
00081         GetNextPos(GetPrevPos(pos)) = pos;
00082         if (_head_pos == insert_pos || _head_pos == ENDPOS) {
00083             _head_pos = pos;
00084         }
00085 
00086         return pos;
00087     }
00088 
00089     // free node from the list and insert into empty list
00090     void FreeNode(size_type pos) {
00091         // free node from list
00092         GetPrevPos(GetNextPos(pos)) = GetPrevPos(pos);
00093         GetNextPos(GetPrevPos(pos)) = GetNextPos(pos);
00094         GetIsUse(pos) = false;
00095         if (_head_pos == pos) {
00096             _head_pos = GetNextPos(pos);
00097         }
00098 
00099         // insert node into empty list's tail
00100         _size--;
00101         GetIsUse(pos) = false;
00102         if (_empty_head_pos == ENDPOS) {  // none node, so form a sinlge loop node
00103             GetNextPos(pos) = pos;
00104             GetPrevPos(pos) = pos;
00105             _empty_head_pos = pos;
00106         } else {
00107             GetNextPos(pos) = _empty_head_pos;
00108             GetPrevPos(pos) = GetPrevPos(_empty_head_pos);
00109             GetPrevPos(GetNextPos(pos)) = pos;
00110             GetNextPos(GetPrevPos(pos)) = pos;
00111         }
00112     }
00113 
00114     static size_t CalcByteSize(size_type size) { return (size + 1) * sizeof(node_type) + sizeof(this_type); }
00115     static size_t CalcElemByteSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->ElemByteSize(); }
00116     static size_t CalcElemMaxSize(void const *ptr) { return ((this_type const *)ptr)->max_size(); }
00117 
00118     size_type size() const { return _size; }
00119     size_type max_size() const { return _max_size - 1; }
00120     size_t ElemByteSize() const { return _elem_byte_size; }
00121 
00122     bool full() const { return _size == _max_size - 1; }
00123     bool empty() const { return _size == 0; }
00124 
00125     node_type *GetNodePtr(size_type pos) const { return (node_type *)(this + 1) + pos; }
00126 
00127     value_type *GetDataPtr(size_type pos) const {
00128         if (pos >= _max_size) return nullptr;
00129         node_type *ptr_node = GetNodePtr(pos);
00130 
00131         if (!ptr_node->is_use) return nullptr;
00132         return &(ptr_node->data);
00133     }
00134 
00135     size_type &GetHeadPos() { return _head_pos; }
00136     size_type &GetNextPos(size_type pos) { return GetNodePtr(pos)->next_pos; }
00137     size_type &GetPrevPos(size_type pos) { return GetNodePtr(pos)->prev_pos; }
00138     bool &GetIsUse(size_type pos) { return GetNodePtr(pos)->is_use; }
00139 
00140 private:
00141     size_type _size;
00142     size_type _max_size;  // here use first node to mark END
00143     size_type _elem_byte_size;
00144     size_type _empty_head_pos;
00145     size_type _head_pos;
00146 };
00147 
00149 // ListIterator
00151 template <typename ElemType, typename SizeType>
00152 class ListIterator : public std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType> {
00153 public:
00154     using base_type = std::iterator<std::bidirectional_iterator_tag, ElemType>;
00155     using value_type = typename base_type::value_type;
00156     using pointer = typename base_type::pointer;
00157     using reference = typename base_type::reference;
00158     using difference_type = typename base_type::difference_type;
00159     using state_type = ListState<ElemType, SizeType>;
00160     using size_type = SizeType;
00161 
00162 public:
00163     // constructor
00164     ListIterator(state_type *ptr_state = nullptr, size_type pos = 0) : _ptr_state(ptr_state), _pos(pos) {}
00165 
00166     // member funcs
00167     ListIterator operator+(difference_type diff) const {
00168         ListIterator tmp = *this;
00169 
00170         if (diff < 0) return tmp - (-diff);
00171         while (diff != 0) {
00172             ++tmp;
00173             --diff;
00174         }
00175         return tmp;
00176     }
00177 
00178     ListIterator operator-(difference_type diff) const {
00179         ListIterator tmp = *this;
00180 
00181         if (diff < 0) return tmp + (-diff);
00182         while (diff != 0) {
00183             --tmp;
00184             --diff;
00185         }
00186         return tmp;
00187     }
00188 
00189     ListIterator &operator++() {
00190         _pos = _ptr_state->GetNextPos(_pos);
00191         return *this;
00192     }
00193     ListIterator &operator--() {
00194         _pos = _ptr_state->GetPrevPos(_pos);
00195         return *this;
00196     }
00197 
00198     pointer operator->() { return _ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos); }
00199     reference operator*() { return *(_ptr_state->GetDataPtr(_pos)); }
00200 
00201     ListIterator operator++(int) {
00202         ListIterator tmp = *this;
00203         ++*this;
00204         return tmp;
00205     }
00206     ListIterator operator--(int) {
00207         ListIterator tmp = *this;
00208         --*this;
00209         return tmp;
00210     }
00211 
00212     bool operator==(ListIterator const& rhs) const { return _ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos; }
00213     bool operator!=(ListIterator const& rhs) const { return !(_ptr_state == rhs._ptr_state && _pos == rhs._pos); }
00214 
00215     size_type GetPos() const { return _pos; }
00216 
00217 private:
00218     state_type *_ptr_state;
00219     size_type _pos;
00220 };
00221 
00222 }  // end of namespace detail
00223 }  // end of namespace container
00224 }  // end of namespace lsf
